languages.text: "Наши саги — это голоса, звучащие сквозь вечность. Когда мы слышим их, мы слышим не истории — мы слышим речь вершителей сих историй".
"Our sagas are voices sounding through eternity. When we hear them, we do not hear stories — we hear the tellers, speaking their words to us now."
languages.original_text: "Наши саги — это голоса, звучащие сквозь вечность. Когда мы слышим их, мы слышим не истории — мы слышим речь вершителей сих историй".

traits.locale_text: "Our sagas are voices sounding through eternity. When we hear them, we do not hear stories — we hear the tellers, speaking their words to us now."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

traits.locale_text: "Our sagas are voices sounding through eternity. When we hear them, we do not hear stories — we hear the tellers, speaking their words to us now."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

traits.locale_text: "Our sagas are voices sounding through eternity. When we hear them, we do not hear stories — we hear the tellers, speaking their words to us now."

languages.text: “我们的史诗是响彻永恒的声音。当我们听到史诗时，我们听到的并不是故事本身，而是讲述者以他们的话语向我们讲述的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Our sagas are voices sounding through eternity. When we hear them, we do not hear stories — we hear the tellers, speaking their words to us now."

traits.locale_text: “我们的史诗是响彻永恒的声音。当我们听到史诗时，我们听到的并不是故事本身，而是讲述者以他们的话语向我们讲述的事情。”
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: 「俺たちのサーガは、永遠を経て鳴り響く歌声だ。サーガを聞くときは物語を聞いてるんじゃない…語り手を、語り手が今俺たちに話す言葉を聞いてるんだ」
languages.original_text: "Our sagas are voices sounding through eternity. When we hear them, we do not hear stories — we hear the tellers, speaking their words to us now."

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちのサーガは、永遠を経て鳴り響く歌声だ。サーガを聞くときは物語を聞いてるんじゃない…語り手を、語り手が今俺たちに話す言葉を聞いてるんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: «Nuestras sagas son voces que resuenan por toda la eternidad. Oírlas no es oír una simple historia, sino escuchar a sus narradores transmitirnos sus palabras».
languages.original_text: "Our sagas are voices sounding through eternity. When we hear them, we do not hear stories — we hear the tellers, speaking their words to us now."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestras sagas son voces que resuenan por toda la eternidad. Oírlas no es oír una simple historia, sino escuchar a sus narradores transmitirnos sus palabras».
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: « Nos sagas sont des voix qui résonnent pour l'éternité. Lorsque nous les écoutons, nous n'entendons pas de simples histoires... nous entendons leurs conteurs qui s'adressent directement à nous. »
languages.original_text: "Our sagas are voices sounding through eternity. When we hear them, we do not hear stories — we hear the tellers, speaking their words to us now."

traits.locale_text: « Nos sagas sont des voix qui résonnent pour l'éternité. Lorsque nous les écoutons, nous n'entendons pas de simples histoires... nous entendons leurs conteurs qui s'adressent directement à nous. »
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Unsere Sagen sind Stimmen, die ewig ertönen. Wenn wir sie hören, hören wir nicht die Geschichten – sondern die Erzähler, die jetzt zu uns sprechen."
languages.original_text: "Our sagas are voices sounding through eternity. When we hear them, we do not hear stories — we hear the tellers, speaking their words to us now."

traits.locale_text: "Unsere Sagen sind Stimmen, die ewig ertönen. Wenn wir sie hören, hören wir nicht die Geschichten – sondern die Erzähler, die jetzt zu uns sprechen."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked

languages.text: "Destanlarımız, sonsuzluğa ulaşan seslerdir. Onları dinlerken hikâyeleri değil, anlatıcının ağzından çıkan sözcükleri duyarız."
languages.original_text: "Our sagas are voices sounding through eternity. When we hear them, we do not hear stories — we hear the tellers, speaking their words to us now."

traits.locale_text: "Destanlarımız sonsuzluğa ulaşan seslerdir. Onları duyduğumuzda hikâyeleri duymayız. Anlatıcının söylediği kelimeleri duyarız."
traits.speaker: UlfarNPC_Naked
